definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[שׂיח]] (√ of foll.; NH [[שִׂיחַ]] speak, [[שִׂיחָה]], [[סִיחָה]] conversation (oft.); Aram. [[שִׂיחַ]] speak; Nö:ZMG xxxvill (1883), 538 cp. Ar. sa0h.a (y) be eager, diligent, whence (Buhl) eager occupation with sthg. as orig. mng. in Heb., but conjectural).
